item.title: Spotlight: Recent Graduate
item.description: Karina G. Diaz Pronouns: she/her/hers Tell us a bit about yourself. My name is Karina Diaz, I’m a research specialist at the Consortium for Policy Research in Education (CPRE) at the University of Pennsylvania. I’m primarily responsible for the design and execution of quantitative analyses for funded research studies, including efficacy evaluations and large-scale projects with experimental and quasi-experimental designs. Prior to this, I collaborated as a research assistant at the STEPP Center at the Institute for Policy Research (IPR) at Northwestern University.
